title: Simple Plan
subtitle: Basic access for one month or one year
description: Great for individuals who want to maintain a regular workout routine.
yearlyFeatures: Free access to two workshops per year
yearlyDescription: Get full access for a year with additional benefits and savings.

title: Pro Plan
subtitle: Advanced access with more features
description: Perfect for those who want to take their training to the next level.
yearlyDescription: Get the most out of your training with added benefits for a whole year.

title: Premium Plan
subtitle: Unlimited access with exclusive perks
description: For those who demand the best, with unlimited access and VIP treatment.
yearlyDescription: Experience the best with VIP treatment and unlimited access for a year.
